name: Dungeon Kitty
description:
This is a minimalist leisure adventure game.
We use simple operations to let cute cat warriors avoid traps in underground cities to collect gold coins.

The game uses the endless gate mode, so long as you are still alive, you can continue to explore.
There are more than 100+ random Levels.
If you compete with your friends, who gets the most gold coins?

Keyboard AD- control left and right mobile J- attack K- jump Esc- menu
Xbox handle X- attack A- jumps Y- menu
